name: Guard Go!
text: If a "Gagaga", "Dododo", and/or "Gogogo" monster(s) you control is destroyed by battle or card effect and sent to the Graveyard: Target 1 of those monsters; Special Summon it, then you can Special Summon up to 2 "Gagaga", "Dododo", and/or "Gogogo" monsters from your hand in Defense Position.
